value:
If magic was originally designed to
fight dragons, the designers were
fools. Look at the conflict it's led to.

I learned magic before I learned to
speak. You could say magic is more
my native tongue than any language.

Who did she mean by "green-haired
wind mage"? Sothe has green hair and
is called Zephyr, but he's no mage...
Did you need something?

I have been asked to stand in as an
instructor, so I am compiling my
notes on wind magic.

I have something for you. It's from
$Nf. Here.

It doesn't matter where or how you
learn to fight. As long as you defeat
your enemy.

A leader can't afford to obsess over
small details. Focus on the full scope
of the battlefield.

Don't let your feelings get in the way.
We will move past this.

If I am to use this, then I would first
like to know precisely what you
expect me to do with it.

My name is Soren. I am a mage. This
outfit may signify that, but my magic
is just as strong in any clothing.

I probably don't need to reiterate
this, but just in case you need a
reminder... We are not friends.$k$pI'm sure that doesn't trouble you
terribly much. I've noticed you have
no shortage of allies.$k$pPersonally, I have no need for that.
My loyalty lies with only one person.
He is why I cooperate with you.$k$pFor whatever it's worth, I do find you
curious. Many seem to adore you,
even though you use them as pawns.$k$pI wonder if that is the result of some
kind of power. And if so, what I might
learn by studying you.$k$pSo, for the time being, consider us to
be...close acquaintances. I will look
forward to working more with you.
You've lost.
Your last mistake.
Enough!
This is the end!
Guess that's that...
Another festival? I'm not much for social gatherings.
Are you trying to get a rise out of me? Really?
I'm not opposed at all to learning. I'd simply prefer to do it on my own.
I didn't learn magic by choice. Still, I consider myself fortunate to have the ability.
I will study any magic that has the potential to be useful to Ike.
Magic is a tool for survival. Nothing more.
If it will benefit you to learn from my wisdom, I suppose I can spare the time.
Proceed.
Orders?
I'll handle it.
